interestingcomments.content:
Problems with fuji app /!/ I never had any issues connecting my iPhone with the app but since moving to android it point blank refuses to connect. I think I've tried everything but it just won't connect to the camera to allow me to transfer images. Really frustrating as I like to edit a few on my dinner break and send to the couple without the need for bringing my laptop!

Anyone able to connect a Huawei to the app and if so, what the hell do you do?!

interestingcomments.content: Why do I need to allow the camera remote app permission to access my location all the time?? Seems unnecessary. Or am I missing something?
